gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਜਲ ਜਲਜ ਅੳੁ ਜਲ ਦੁਧ ਸੀਲ ਮੀਨ ਚਕੲੀ ਕਮਲ ਦਿਨਕਰਿ ਪ੍ਰਤਿ ਪ੍ਰੀਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Jal Jalaj Au Jal Dudh Seel Meena , Chakaee Kamal Dinakari Prati Preet Hai ?
translation: Just as a lotus flower loves water, water has affinity for milk, fish loves water, ruddy Sheldrake and lotus love the sun;

gurmukhi: ਦੀਪਕ ਪਤੰਗ ਅਲਿ ਕਮਲ ਚਕੋਰ ਸਸਿ ਮ੍ਰਿਗ ਨਾਦ ਬਾਦ ਘਨ ਚਾਤ੍ਰਿਕ ਸੁ ਚੀਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Deepak Patang Ali Kamal Chakor Sasi , Mrig Naad Baad Ghan Chaatrik Su Cheet Hai ?
translation: A winged insect (patanga) is attracted to the flame of the light, a black bee is crazy of the fragrance of the lotus flower, a red legged partridge is ever craving for a glimpse of the moon, a deer has affinity for music, while a rain-bird is ever alert f

gurmukhi: ਨਾਰਿ ਅੳੁ ਭਤਾਰੁ ਸੁਤ ਮਾਤ ਜਲ ਤ੍ਰਿਖਾਵੰਤ ਖੁਧਿਅਾਰਥੀ ਭੋਜਨ ਦਾਰਿਦ੍ਰ ਧਨ ਮੀਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Naari Au Bhataaru Sout Maat Jal Trikhaavanta , Khudhiaaradee Bhojan Daaridr Dhan Meet Hai ?
translation: As a wife loves her husband, a son is deeply attached with his mother, a thirsty man craves for water, a hungry for food, and a pauper is always trying to befriend wealth.

gurmukhi: ਮਾੲਿਅਾ ਮੋਹ ਦ੍ਰੋਹ ਦੁਖਦਾੲੀ ਨ ਸਹਾੲੀ ਹੋਤ ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖ ਸੰਧਿ ਮਿਲੇ ਤ੍ਰਿਗੁਨ ਅਤੀਤ ਹੈ ||੨੯੨||
transliteration: Maaiaa Moh Droh Doukhadaaee N Sahaaee Hota , Gur Sikh Sandhi Milay Trigoun Ateet Hai ?292?
translation: But all these loves, craves, affinities are three characteristics of maya (mammon). Therefore their love is deceit and trick that causes sufferings. None of these affections stand by a person at the final hour of him life. Love of a Sikh and his Guru is b
